title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You could go overboard today as you provoke peoples reactions with your shocking behavior. Although you want to make others think by stimulating animated discussions, its still necessary to respect everyones boundaries. You may be fed up with the same old arguments and stale rebuttals, but its critical to stop before you cross over the line. Its easy to push someone away as the brazen Scorpio Sun opposes revolutionary Uranus in your 7th House of Relationships. Remember, you can only expect your friends to be compassionate and thoughtful if you send out kindness and positivity yourself. Stir their minds rigorously but be gentle with their hearts. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
